name.description: The name of the API Management Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Group should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The name of the [API Management Service](api_management.html

display_name.description: The display name of this API Management Group.

description.description: The description of this API Management Group.

external_id.description: The identifier of the external Group. For example, an Azure Active Directory group `aad://<tenant>.onmicrosoft.com/groups/<group object id>`.

type.description: The type of this API Management Group. Possible values are `custom` and `external`. Default is `custom`.

id.description: The ID of the API Management Group.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management Group.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management Group.
